options.command: npx nx watch --projects {{app-name}} --includeDependentProjects -- npx nx build-deps {{app-name}}
npx nx watch --projects website --includeDependentProjects -- npx nx build-deps website
npx nx watch --projects admin --includeDependentProjects -- npx nx build-deps admin

metadata.description: A platform for frontend developers to practice coding challenges and prepare for technical interviews

metadata.scriptContent: nx build website --turbopack && echo '✅ Build successful' || (echo '❌ Build failed' && exit 1)
cp .husky/pre-commit-fast .husky/pre-commit && echo '✅ Switched to FAST pre-commit checks'
cp .husky/pre-commit .husky/pre-commit && echo '✅ Switched to STANDARD pre-commit checks'
cp .husky/pre-commit-full .husky/pre-commit && echo '✅ Switched to FULL pre-commit checks'
cp .husky/pre-commit-e2e .husky/pre-commit && echo '✅ Switched to E2E pre-commit checks with auto-resolution'
npm run cleanup:project && npm run health-check
